document.full_text: u.s. companies in march sold the most goods and services overseas in nearly two decades. but a big jump in oil prices pushed the nation's trade deficit higher.
document.title: u.s. trade deficit widens in march on pricier oil
lines_and_colors: u.s. companies in march sold the most goods and services overseas in nearly two decades. but a big jump in oil prices pushed the nation's trade deficit higher.
